column4: 2015. service information visitation information none. private service view flowers & gifts. larry howard hainrick
column9: minnesota lost his battle with cancer on june 18th
column10: 2015. larry is proceeded in death by his wife mavis hainrick of 52 years. he is survived by: his loving friend
column11: ann aarestad and her family; his brother in-law james (donna) harriman; sister in-law gay (lee) stensland; nephews
column13: jeffrey (deb) stensland; grandnieces annika & erika; grandnephew woody. larry was a very loving and giving man who will be deeply missed by all.
